sn15.12:1: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, this saṁsara is without discoverable beginning … . Whenever you see anyone happy and fortunate,sn.ii.87you can conclude: ‘We too have experienced the same thing in this long course.’ For what reason? Because, bhikkhus, this saṁsara is without discoverable beginning … . It is enough to be liberated from them."
